annotation.text: After transient expression in COS-7 cells, EYFP-IP3R1 (or EGFP-IP3R1; data not shown) and ECFP-IP3R3 (or EGFP-IP3R3; data not shown) were uniformly localized to the ER.
After transient expression in COS-7 cells, EYFP-IP3R1 (or EGFP-IP3R1; data not shown) and ECFP-IP3R3 (or EGFP-IP3R3; data not shown) were uniformly localized to the ER.

By contrast, IP3R3 (the other major endogenous IP3R subtype in COS cells) had similar properties in the perinuclear (Mf = 79 +- 2% and D = 0.016 +- 0.004 mum2/s, n = 10) (a subset of the data presented in Table 1) and peripheral (Mf = 83 +- 5% and D = 0.020 +- 0.006 mum2/s, n = 10) regions (Fig. 6, D and F).
